div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1000 Akhal-Sopeli, Zugdidi raion, Georgia, 1913-1915 Burial: before 420 B.C. (Golenko-Kapa- nadze) Contents: 64+ AR. Pot hoard Colchis: 5 didr. (as NNM 130, 2 [3], 3 [2]) 59 hemidr. (3 with new types: lion hd. and lioness protome) Disposition: Tiflis 45; Kutaisi (Hist.- Ethnogr. Mus.) 3 Pakhomov II, 305; III 640 (repetition) Malakatiia, VDI 1939, no. 4, pp. 157-9; Vestnik Gosudarstvennogo Muzeria Gruzii 14 B (1947), pp. 425-8 (in Georgian) Zograph, "Nakhodky," 36 â€ Golenko-Kapanadze, NE 6 (1966), pp. 31-61
